verses.name: Joshua 13:19
verses.text: And Kirjathaim, and Sibmah, and Zareth–shahar in the mount of the valley,

verses.name: Joshua 13:20
verses.text: And Beth–peor, and Ashdoth–pisgah, and Beth–jeshimoth,

verses.name: Joshua 13:21
verses.text: And all the cities of the plain, and all the kingdom of Sihon king of the Amorites, which reigned in Heshbon, whom Moses smote with the princes of Midian, Evi, and Rekem, and Zur, and Hur, and Reba, which were dukes of Sihon, dwelling in the country.

verses.name: Joshua 13:22
verses.text: Balaam also the son of Beor, the soothsayer, did the children of Israel slay with the sword among them that were slain by them.
